entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switches are unreliable #6346
  • There should be parse error when setting invalid value to FlowDirection property #6343
  • Consolidate screen size/density APIs #6340
    .NET 7
  • Latest update broke build on all working maui/ blazor solutions #6336
  • Essentials support for net6.0-macos #6333
  • Shell on iOS: completly black screen with .svg files in xaml #6332
  • Shell on iOS: icons are not scaled #6331
  • Shell on Windows: Icons not shown #6330
  • Shell on Windows: Navigation not working #6329
  • CarouselView Position property not updating after changing ItemsSource #6328
  • FlexLayout property values don't have intellisense #6325
  • Drag drop gestures seemingly randomly gets eaten on Windows desktop when dragging outside application #6321
  • .NET MAUI RC1 - CollectionView extremely slow #6317
  • Slider Minimum crashes the app #6305
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • MenuBarItems are not rendered if Title is not set #6303
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • SearchHandler does not display more than one suggestion #6293
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Entry and Switch in a Grid #6292
    6.0.300-servicing
  • The Name property of a focusable element must not be null. #6290
    6.0.300
  • Clipping is still not working #6260
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • iOS Background (Remote) Notification Functionality Absent (Since Preview 12) #6259
    6.0.300-rc.3

Closed

  • Blazor Hybrid Dev Tools Console Logging #6110
    .NET 7
  • SwipeItems.CollectionChanged event sends wrong sender object #6291
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Evaluate use of string comparisons inside Maui.Core #3085
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • When adding Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Base nuget package can't build the MAUI project #4276
    6.0.300
  • Shell on Windows: It is really ugly #6334
  • MAUI app template will not build due to LibZipSharp error VS Community 2022 Preview 3 #6254
  • Label linebreakmode tests are failing on WinUI #6084
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Setting HeightRequest/WidthRequest back to -1 currently doesn't reset WxH to unset #6107
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Two heading level 1 is present in hello world page #6261
    6.0.300
  • .NET MAUI Windows target publishing/archiving #4329
  • [Enhancement] Provide a Rendered event for WebView #1786
    Future
  • Partial Classes in Platform Folders Causing Ambiguity Errors #6198
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Not allowed to load local resource for Android #2907
    Future
  • Consider using SkiaSharp for painting HTML/CSS UI onto the screen. #3449
    Future
  • Error Reusing Blazor Hosted Wasm in Blazor App MAUI Project #3581
    Future
  • Spike SetSemanticFocus API #3472
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS breaks Java output parsing #1748
    6.0.300
  • Cannot generate valid Android apk #4660
    6.0.300
  • Shell allows navigation when it should not #5964
  • Publish MAUI app with project reference to class library net6.0 - cause erorrs #5993
  • [RC1] Cannot build MAUI library #6052
  • dotnet maui blazor application dotnet version upgrade issue #6169
  • Image from byte[] source doesn't work on Android #6256
  • No Icons in AppShell #6294
  • Button Command CanExecute does not update the button visual on Windows #6297
  • MAUI templates don't show in VS 2022 Preview #6181
  • Blazor Hybrid index.html script and css files are case sensitive #6248
  • <Image> cannot load image from URL on Android #6295
  • Implicit styles not applied to underlying items depending on where they are set. #5016
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • VisualStateManager does not seem to work on Android #5449
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • ApplicationDisplayVersion problem ITMS-90062 error #6037
  • [Android] Grid columns not correctly calculated when control spans columns and auto column definition is used #6138
    6.0.300-rc.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks from 7.0.100-preview.2.22102.8 to 7.0.100-preview.4.22204.4 #6345
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Build from 15.9.20 to 17.1.0 #6344
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix SwipeItems.CollectionChanged sender issue #6342
  • Handle content hiding separately for hot restart scenarios #6341
  • Bump AspNet.Security.OAuth.Apple from 6.0.0 to 6.0.4 #6339
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Build.Framework from 15.9.20 to 17.1.0 #6338
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Return zero for scaled screen size when density is zero #6337
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.0 to 0.11.1 #6335
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.2 to 4.12.0.8 #6327
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix Toolbar property calculation when you have nested Nav Pages #6326
  • Bump Svg.Custom from 0.4.1 to 0.5.0 #6320
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Updated Default project template title #6319
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • Add VC Redist dependency to Windows templates #6318
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Allow closing of windows when using a MainPage #6316
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Update template styles #6312
    area/Xaml </>, area/a11y, area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 #6311
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 117.0.0 to 117.0.1.5 #6309
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1020.30 to 1.0.1185.39 #6308
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump MSBuild.Sdk.Extras from 3.0.23 to 3.0.44 #6307
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.0 to 6.0.4 #6302
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.0.0 to 4.2.1 #6301
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.0 to 6.0.4 #6300
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump SkiaSharp from 2.88.0-preview.127 to 2.88.0-preview.256 #6296
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 119.1.0 to 120.0.0.7 #6287
    dependencies
  • Bump Selenium.WebDriver from 3.141.0 to 4.1.0 #6286
    dependencies
  • Bump Svg.Skia from 0.4.1 to 0.5.0 #6282
    dependencies
  • Bump Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Core from 15.9.20 to 17.1.0 #6281
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
  • Bump Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Core from 15.9.20 to 17.1.0 #6279
    dependencies
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.6.1.2 to 1.6.1.6 #6276
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
  • Bump NUnit from 3.13.2 to 3.13.3 #6274
    dependencies
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.0 to 6.0.4 #6273
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Svg2VectorDrawable.Net from 0.1.0 to 0.3.0 #6265
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix ArcSegment rendering #6264
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Generate MSIX when publishing #6262
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0.300-rc.2

Merged

  • Bump Fizzler from 1.2.0 to 1.3.0 #6271
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Selenium.Support from 3.141.0 to 4.1.0 #6272
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.0.0-4.final to 4.1.0 #6285
    dependencies
  • Use Android AppCompat Everywhere #6306
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Bump Castle.Core from 4.3.1 to 4.4.1 #6267
    area/upstream, dependencies
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 16.7.1 to 17.1.0 #6268
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 3.9.0 to 4.1.0 #6284
    dependencies
  • Fix LinebreakMode tests for Windows #6324
  • Allow un-setting of Core Width/Height with -1 via Controls Width/HeightRequest #6323
  • Tweak templates to fix accessibility bugs #6322
    area/a11y, area/templates 📄, 6.0.300
  • Bump Mono.Cecil from 0.11.3 to 0.11.4 #6283
    dependencies
  • [ci] Remove pool demands for device tests #6224
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add Essentials Maps TryOpen #5834
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Xam.Plugin.DeviceInfo from 3.0.2 to 4.1.1 #6289
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.CodeDom from 5.0.0 to 6.0.0 #6266
    area/upstream, dependencies
  • Bump Microsoft.Build.NoTargets from 2.0.1 to 3.3.0 #6277
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.0.2 to 1.0.3 #6270
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump coverlet.collector from 1.3.0 to 3.1.2 #6288
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Blazor] Use static AppOriginUri everywhere #5941
    area/blazor 🕸️, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Android] SelectableItemsViewAdapter: update SelectableViewHolder on selection changes #6249
    platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 3.0.15 to 3.2.7 #6280
    dependencies
  • [dependabot] Add packages to ignore on dependabot #6299
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove nuspec for old stuff #6245
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add test for #6239; Add tests and equivalent fix for HorizontalStackLayoutManager #6258
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Cleanup code format #6242
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Let's see if we can make these tests stable #6241

Updated

  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
  • Add User-Agent when downloading image streams #5985
    t/bug, area/image :framed_picture:
  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/architecture
  • Spike adding implictor styles to handle null colors #6255
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix for 3848 - FlexLayout doesn't measure content #6085
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Remove interfering keyboard focus logic #6246
    area/a11y, area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, control-general, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Correctly notify changes in the Page BackgroundColor property #5706
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
